author: veithen
msg: Adapted to change r1365274 in Axiom.

author: gnodet
msg: [ARIES-867] Deadlock if stopping a blueprint bundle while the blueprint container is in the create state.

author: hdu
msg: Handling them should must be independent of their ordering.
Multiply defined attributes should not happen in valid documents, but just in case it happens we ignore all but the first.
Also did some other minor cleanups like the removal of unused vars and using string constants in a more direct way.
